title: Lag spikes from 60-300ish, around every 5minutes.
body:
It's definitely not the isp thats causing it. I play beside my roommate most times, and he never gets the lag spikes. I connect wirelessly to the router.
I've tried to solve the problem by myself because ive had it for a while now.. I dont know what actions I can take to help.
Looking for an answer different from reseting the router, or turning off my firewall...

replies.body:
Just to clarify, do you still get these issues when you connect via an ethernet cable to the internet?  Doing so can isolate whether this is an issue with the connection itself, or just the fact that you are on wifi.

Otherwise, if you haven't already, make sure to complete all of the steps in our Connection Issues Article.  There are a ton of steps there, but they are all crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

If you've already tried every single one of these steps already, then make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to get this issue resolved.  Make sure to include the following in the ticket as well:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

This sounds like the EXACT same problem I'm having. I have a STABLE connection no matter how many times Riot wants to shift blame onto unstable wifi connections. I have high speed internet. No other game or streaming service is affected. 

Every 4-5 minutes in game for the last 2 months (give or take) I get CRIPPLING LAG SPIKES. 

I have a ticket open and have posted in several other threads without getting ANY help with my problem. Please don't just refer me to the network troubleshooting guide, by now I've committed most of it to memory.

I have lol logs, netalyzer, and dxdiag info at the ready for anybody that wants to help solve a month/s old issue myself and many other players are experiencing.
